pages.text: $(li)These small windged insects with called Flies are around over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They are attracted to dead dying things, for example, Zombies.$(br)$(li)Flies can be bred with Rotten Flesh.$(br)$(li)They may drop Maggots on death.
If a Fly happens to find itself in the Nether, it will transform into a dangerous $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquito$(/l).
